title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: October 18, 2023, 12:30:29 AMLast edit: December 20, 2023, 12:44:47 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Hello! Ballet will end up putting these up on the site - most likely in packs of 5 for $35  per pack.If you would like to get less than a 5 pack and save $.50 a wallet, I will be doing a group buy to get 50 of each and thus can split them out.There are two designs - one portrait layout and one landscape layoutPRICE:Cost is $6.50 eaPayment is due within 48 hours of making your reservation PAYMENTS ACCEPTED:USD via Strike: strike.me/moparminingllc Bitcoin: bc1q30g8fj0kgrh06sacksdukw6cpw3c5rq492g66aLightning via address: moparminingllc@strike.meLightning invoice: send me a dm and I will reply with a LNURLjust put your name and qty of each version desired.example: MoparMiningLLC portrait: 1 landscape 1
